00026 QWidget* ConfigurableElementDelegate::createEditor(QWidget* parent, 
00027                                                                                                    const QStyleOptionViewItem& option,
00028                                                                                                    const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00029 
00030         switch (index.column()) {
00031 
00032                 // if editing name of configurable element
00033                 case 0: {
00034                         QComboBox* box = new QComboBox(parent);
00035                         // set box to be editable
00036                         box->setEditable(true);
00037 
00038                         if (component_) {
00039                                 QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> > params = component_->getModelParameters();
00040                                 QStringList paramNames = params.keys();
00041                                 box->addItems(paramNames);
00042                         }
00043                         return box;
00044                                 }
00045 
00046                 // if editing value of configurable element
00047                 case 1: {
00048                         QLineEdit* line = new QLineEdit(parent);
00049                         connect(line, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00050                                 this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00051                         return line;
00052                                 }
00053                 default:
00054                         return QStyledItemDelegate::createEditor(parent, option, index);
00055         }
00056 }
00057 
00058 void ConfigurableElementDelegate::setEditorData( QWidget* editor, 
00059                                                                                                 const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00060         
00061         switch (index.column()) {
00062                 
00063                 // if name of configurable element
00064                 case 0: {
00065 
00066                         QComboBox* box = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00067                         Q_ASSERT_X(box, "ConfigurableElementDelegate::setEditorData",
00068                                 "Type conversion failed for QComboBox");
00069 
00070                         QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00071                         int index = box->findText(text);
00072 
00073                         box->setCurrentIndex(index);
00074                         return;
00075                                 }
00076                 // if value of configurable element
00077                 case 1: {
00078                         QLineEdit* line = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00079                         Q_ASSERT_X(line, "ConfigurableElementDelegate::setEditorData",
00080                                 "Type conversion failed for QLineEdit");
00081 
00082                         QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00083                         line->setText(text);
00084                         return;
00085                                 }
00086                 default: {
00087                         QStyledItemDelegate::setEditorData(editor, index);
00088                         return;
00089                                  }
00090         }
00091 }
00092 
00093 void ConfigurableElementDelegate::setModelData( QWidget* editor,
00094                                                                                            QAbstractItemModel* model,
00095                                                                                            const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00096 
00097         switch (index.column()) {
00098         
00099                 // if name of the configurable element
00100                 case 0: {
00101                         QComboBox* box = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00102                         Q_ASSERT_X(box, "ConfigurableElementDelegate::setEditorData",
00103                                 "Type conversion failed for QComboBox");
00104 
00105                         QString text = box->currentText();
00106                         model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00107                         return;
00108                                 }
00109                 // if value of configurable element
00110                 case 1: {
00111                         QLineEdit* line = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00112                         Q_ASSERT_X(line, "ConfigurableElementDelegate::setEditorData",
00113                                 "Type conversion failed for QLineEdit");
00114 
00115                         QString text = line->text();
00116                         model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00117                         return;
00118                                 }
00119                 default: {
00120                         QStyledItemDelegate::setModelData(editor, model, index);
00121                         return;
00122                                  }
00123         }
00124 }

00126 void ConfigurableElementDelegate::setComponent( QSharedPointer<Component> component ) {
00127         component_ = component;
00128 }

00130 void ConfigurableElementDelegate::commitAndCloseEditor() {
00131 
00132         QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(sender());
00133 
00134         // if editor was line edit
00135         if (lineEdit) {
00136                 emit commitData(lineEdit);
00137                 emit closeEditor(lineEdit);
00138         }
00139 }
